ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_01_10:
’Sup, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waitin’ for ya, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m always down for a swim or
a Pokémon battle, dude.
Either one’ll do!
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_01_10:
Yo, you know how much I love the
ocean, right? Can you believe I actually
almost drowned once?
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s true! Just when I thought I wasn’t
gonna make it, I got rescued by one o’ the
Caring Pokémon, Alomomola.
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_03_10:
I was barely conscious, but thanks to
Alomomola’s rad healing abilities,
I made it back to safety.
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_04_10:
I’ll never forget how the membrane on its
back felt while it carried me to shore—
soft and slippery but kinda warm, too.
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_01_10:
I wonder how that Alomomola’s
doing these days...
ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_02_10:
The ocean’s full o’ friendly fishes!
I love ’em all, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_01_10:
My Carracosta’s shell is suuuper
hard, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_02_10:
A while back, he accidentally
bumped me in the face...
ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_03_10:
Man, I was NOT expectin’ it to
hurt like that! It felt like concrete!
ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_04_10:
If I hadn’t been wearin’ my goggles,
things coulda gone reeeal bad!
ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0702_01_10:
Be careful out there, all right?
Don’t be reckless, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_01_10:
I’m a true man of the sea! When I’m not
workin’ at my Pokémon Gym, I’m usually
out swimmin’ somewhere!
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_02_10:
Some people tell me that bein’ a
man of the sea isn’t a real job, though...
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_03_10:
I mean, I know that... Duh.
But I love the sea more than I
love food, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_04_10: I dunno how else to say it...
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_01_10: I just keep doin’ what I love to do, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_02_10: That’s my motto! Do what ya love!
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_01_10:
Man, I love the ocean!
The beautiful, big, open blue!
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_02_10: And it’s got sooo much life, too!
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_03_10:
The ocean’s seriously epic, dude!
I can’t get enough of it!
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_04_10:
If I could be that epic someday,
that’d be pretty gnarly.
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_01_10:
When things get tough, I just stare
out at the waves and they wash
all my worries away.
ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_02_10: Life is meant to be epic, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_01_10:
The beaches in Unova are rad,
but the ones here on Pasio are
pretty epic, too!
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_02_10:
I’ve got this righteous dream, dude—
to swim in every ocean in the world!
Wicked, right?!
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m plannin’ to swim every inch
o’ these beaches while I’m here!
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_04_10:
You should come swim with me when
you feel up to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_01_10:
If you wanna get a real feel for what
the ocean’s like, swimmin’ is
where it’s at.
ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_02_10:
You can even race against Pokémon, dude!
It’s totally awesome!
ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0701_01_10:
Whoa! There you are!
I’ve got somethin’ for ya!
ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_01_10: Use it whenever you feel like it!
ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_02_10:
You don’t gotta be a hoarder, either.
There’s more where that came from, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_01_10:
Dude, the sea is seriously huge!
Yeah, you probably already knew that...
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_02_10:
But listen! It looks gigantic on the
surface, right? But there’s so much
underneath that you can’t even see!
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_03_10:
I mean, all kinds o’ rivers feed into
the ocean, and the ocean just takes ’em
all in, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_04_10:
That’s how I wanna be! Openhearted
and accepting of others, just like
the ocean.
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_01_10:
When I’m swimmin’ in the big, open
ocean, I stop carin’ about all the stuff
that worries me on land.
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_02_10:
I know what I wanna do
and who I wanna be, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_03_10:
I wanna be epic! I wanna be openhearted!
I wanna be a true man o’ the sea!
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_01_10:
I try to always judge things
with my own two eyes, you know?
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_02_10:
I mean, who’s a good person? Who’s a
bad person? That’s somethin’ you’ve
gotta judge for yourself!
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_03_10:
If you let somebody else make that
judgment for you, you might miss out
on something awesome one day, dude.
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_01_10:
If you see somebody in trouble, you should
help ’em out, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if another dude tells you they’re
a bad person, that shouldn’t stop you
from helpin’ ’em out!
ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s how I live my life, dude!
I believe it to my core.
ch0052_00_shizui/3001_0701_01_10: ’Sup, dude! Ready for a mornin’ swim?
ch0052_00_shizui/3002_0701_01_10:
Hey, you an early riser, too?
Stayin’ healthy is no small thing!
ch0052_00_shizui/3003_0701_01_10:
Whoa, look at that sunshine!
The sea’s almost sparklin’!
ch0052_00_shizui/3004_0701_01_10:
Yo, what are you lazin’ around for?
Up and at ’em!
ch0052_00_shizui/3005_0701_01_10:
Dude, it’s wicked out tonight!
I’m down to head out one more time, if you are.
ch0052_00_shizui/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re out pretty late tonight.
It’s good to take breaks, you know!
